relation: The school is located on a main street so there are stores, movie theaters, a mall, and food.
There are four or five food options and you are located on a main street with tons of fast food.
The doorms are not huge but are a ton of fun.
The small class settings keeps you involved and in check.
It is not very large but the campus and people really make you feel at home and loved.
Bethel College is inviting. Bethel College is close-knit. Bethel College seeks excellence.
pageTitle: Bethel College - Indiana Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {142430=Especially for the freshmen dorms, dorm life is amazing. About three times a week, any of the girls in the dorm that are wanting to eat when group dinner is called, decide where to go to eat as a group, and then walk there together, and talk as they dine at their restaurant of choice. Usually, the RA's have planned an activity at least three times a week. Whether it is decorating Christmas cookies, watching a movie, or eating takeout Thai food dinner to see how it is. The RA's are wonderful and very helpful. It takes a wonderful person to help you with your overflowing toilet at 1:00 in the morning, on finals week., 153351=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC}

You could win a free scholarship. textAfterTable: Dominique Dvojacki from Crown Point, IN 10/18/2010 Reviewer is A current student here. 3 out of 3 people found this review useful. 2 of 33 Categories Comments Great for these types of students Anyone can come here and fit in. Professors are willing to work with you and there is a wide spread of spiritual levels on campus for all types Tips for prospective students Choose a place that fits you like a shoe :) Bang for the buck Bethel isn't cheep- but it's all worth it in the end Am enjoying being here I stepped on the campus and it felt like home. The professors here are great. I even am friends with them Am learning a lot I'm a nursing student and I love having the small classes. It means more one on one time with the professors
